about_the_game:
「choirsaintess 」talk about a teenager YI-CHA-SI accidentally travelled through a different world, Because of an opportunity to embark on a journey to find a way to go home

During the journey, he gradually found that he had been associated with the world in the past, not by chance。

After consulting with all forces, he gradually recovered the lost memories of the past and reminded him of the most important things he had lost in the world。

(And the ultimate purpose of his trip is to find her back and repay the sins of the past。

■In the traditional turn-based RPG game, each character has his own talent skills, up to 9 available characters and 17 occupations for you to explore

■It has a complex equipment synthesis system, allowing you to match with character talents to create your own unique gameplay

■There are three difficulty modes to choose from, a multi-week system, and a large number of hidden elements are waiting for you to explore

■With the element of favourability, there are five endings in total. Which heroine will be connected with you in the end?

■There are still many small games waiting for you to challenge

Basic gameplay：
Move：↑↓←→
Confirm and investigate：Ｚ、空白鍵
Cancel and Menu：Ｘ、ＥＸＣ
Change the Move Speed：ＳＨＩＦＴ
Skip The Dialogue：ＣＴＲＬ
detailed_description:
Check Out This




About the Game

「choirsaintess 」talk about a teenager YI-CHA-SI accidentally travelled through a different world, Because of an opportunity to embark on a journey to find a way to go home

During the journey, he gradually found that he had been associated with the world in the past, not by chance。

After consulting with all forces, he gradually recovered the lost memories of the past and reminded him of the most important things he had lost in the world。

(And the ultimate purpose of his trip is to find her back and repay the sins of the past。

■In the traditional turn-based RPG game, each character has his own talent skills, up to 9 available characters and 17 occupations for you to explore

■It has a complex equipment synthesis system, allowing you to match with character talents to create your own unique gameplay

■There are three difficulty modes to choose from, a multi-week system, and a large number of hidden elements are waiting for you to explore

■With the element of favourability, there are five endings in total. Which heroine will be connected with you in the end?

■There are still many small games waiting for you to challenge

Basic gameplay：
Move：↑↓←→
Confirm and investigate：Ｚ、空白鍵
Cancel and Menu：Ｘ、ＥＸＣ
Change the Move Speed：ＳＨＩＦＴ
Skip The Dialogue：ＣＴＲＬ
name: 謳歌的聖女

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
